Title: Graduate Nurse StaRN Program
Job_Description:
Description
Are you looking for a place to deliver excellent care patients deserve? At Belton Medical Center we support our colleagues in their positions. Join our Team as a(an) Graduate Nurse StaRN Program and access programs to assist with every stage of your career.
Complete 1 Application to be considered for any and all Graduate Nurse opportunities at HCA Midwest Health Hospitals and all units.
Our recruitment team will partner with you and guide you through an interview and shadow experience based on your Location, Unit, Specialty and Shift preferences.
Benefits

Title: Graduate Nurse StaRN Program
Job_Description:
Description
Introduction
Last year our HCA Healthcare colleagues invested over 156,000 hours volunteering in our communities. As a Project Manager II with Mobile Heartbeat you can be a part of an organization that is devoted to giving back!
Benefits
Mobile Heartbeat, offers a total rewards package that supports the health, life, career and retirement of our colleagues. The available plans and programs include:
Comprehensive medical coverage that covers many common services at no cost or for a low copay. Plans include prescription drug and behavioral health coverage as well as telemedicine services and free AirMed medical transportation.
